Initially, the young boy with dark, curly hair and a striped jacket is positioned on the left side of the frame, in the middle ground, facing right in profile. Beside him, in the center of the frame, stands another figure with their head wrapped in wire or string, also in the middle ground. The camera is positioned at the subjects' level, capturing their upper bodies. The boy turns his head to face forward, changing his expression to wide-eyed, while the second figure remains still. The scene is framed with a dark, out-of-focus shoulder in the foreground on the right, indicating an over-the-shoulder perspective. The background remains pitch-black, emphasizing the focused light on the subjects.
